name: intro
commands: Lord Rikard's castle...|Sealed off by a barrier disconnecting it from the rest of the world...|Right after a mysterious visit from a wielder of dark magic...
This barrier is a nasty piece of work.|I can remove it but...
I warn you.|I can only hazard guesses on what exists inside this castle now.|Nothing good. I assure you.
Nothing? How can you be so sure?
This seal...this magic...I've seen something similar to this on a much smaller scale.|The fact that your enemy Lilith and Lithrasir were both here...|It does not paint a good omen.
Stand back now, I'm going to dispel the barrier.
This barrier will take a while to dispel.|Why don't you plan amongst yourselves?
Why do you think Lilith came here?|Could it be related to what happened with the Chalice?
So after she came to the castle, she came for the chalice?|The timelines matches but...|Why would she do this?|What did she gain for creating this seal over the castle?|
Could it have been to occupy Aesc?
Maybe...there has to be something more going on.|Aesc said he likely won't be able to assist us in battle against Lilith.|We'll have to hurry back to the castle after we're done here.
We should ask the old man for his thoughts after this.
Ah.....it's been awhile since I've last visited.|I see already much has changed...|and much has stayed the same.
I'll be following behind your group to figure out what had happened.|With all this magic consumption these past few days...I'm close to out.|So I won't be able to help if there's a fight.
You've already done plenty for us.|It's our turn to lead the way.
